data.title: censor this. easy
data.statement:
You work at a newspaper, and you have to censor forbidden words in reports.
Every day you receive a list of [[C]] forbidden words, and  [[N]] reports  to censor .

to censor a word you have to keep first and last letters and replace the rest with {{*}}.

to make this easier:
All elements in the list of forbidden words have an uppercase first letter and lowercase rest.

All forbidden words in the reports are (apart from the case) exactly like in the list (no suffix or affix is added).and every forbidden word in the reports is followed by a space or and empty string (e.g. : "golf." will be written as "golf ."

testCases.title: Simple
testCases.testIn:
1
President
1
Today our president played Golf

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
1
Golf
1
Today our president played Golf alone
testCases.testOut: Today our president played G**f alone

testCases.title: Censure the whole report
testCases.testIn:
5
Buy Sell Money Fish Boat
3
My mum asked me to buy fish but i couldn't afford a boat .
buy sell Money fish Boat
sell a boat to buy fish
testCases.testOut:
My mum asked me to b*y f**h but i couldn't afford a b**t .
b*y s**l M***y f**h B**t
s**l a b**t to b*y f**h

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
5
Buy Sell Money Fish Boat
3
My mum asked me to buy fish but i couldn't afford a boot .
buy sell Money fish Boat
i'm a coder
testCases.testOut:
My mum asked me to b*y f**h but i couldn't afford a boot .
b*y s**l M***y f**h B**t
i'm a coder

data.constraints:
Forbidden words have a minimum of 3 letters.
0<[[C]]<=100
0<[[N]]<=3
data.stubGenerator:
read c:int
read list:string(1024)
read n:int
loop n read report:string(1024) 
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[C]] for the number of forbidden words.

<<Line 2:>> [[C]] space separated words (representing the forbidden words).

<<Line 3:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of reports to censor 

<<Next [[N]] lines:>> String representing the reports.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You work at a newspaper, and you have to censor forbidden words in reports.
Every day you receive a list of C forbidden words, and N reports to censor .

to censor a word you have to keep first and last letters and replace the rest with *.

to make this easier:
All elements in the list of forbidden words have an uppercase first letter and lowercase rest.

All forbidden words in the reports are (apart from the case) exactly like in the list (no suffix or affix is added).and every forbidden word in the reports is followed by a space or and empty string (e.g. : "golf." will be written as "golf ."
Input
Line 1: An integer C for the number of forbidden words.

Line 2: C space separated words (representing the forbidden words).

Line 3: An integer N for the number of reports to censor

Next N lines: String representing the reports.
Output
N lines: censored reports.
Constraints
Forbidden words have a minimum of 3 letters.
0<C<=100
0<N<=3
Example
Input
1
President
1
Today our president played Golf
Output
Today our p*******t played Golf
